    • Handler

      public Handler(Socket socket, int threadNum, String className)
      Constructor method, assigns private and constant fields
      Parameters:
      socket - The TCP/IP connection socket to be used by this handler
      threadNum - The Thread number of this handler, used in debug messages
      className - The name of the class, used in debug messages
